CT_RegEx 0.003<RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_W_0001VSB|TrueTYP|2FND|[:alpha:]*[:digit:]+[:alpha:]+[:alnum:]*&#124;[:alpha:]+[:digit:]+[:alnum:]*&#124;[:upper:]*[:lower:]+[:upper:]+[:alnum:]*&#124;[:upper:][:upper:]+[:lower:]+TXT|Word with lowercase and upcase or with numberISR|TrueSNS|TrueDUA|FalseLB1|MD1|1RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_W_0002VSB|TrueTYP|2FND|«[^»]*$&#124;^[^«]*»&#124;“[^”]*$&#124;^[^“]*”&#124;\([^\)]*$&#124;^[^\(]*\)&#124;^«[:lower:]+&#124;^— [:lower:]+&#124;—[^\s]&#124;[^\s]—&#124;»[^\s&#124;\.&#124;,]TXT|Dialogues and parentheses to be verifiedISR|TrueSNS|TrueDUA|FalseLB1|MD1|1RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_W_0003VSB|TrueTYP|2FND|[\.&#124;\?&#124;!&#124;,&#124;;&#124;:&#124;…][^"&#124; &#124;»&#124;'&#124;\)&#124;’&#124;”]TXT|Punctuation warningISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|FalseLB1|MD1|1RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_W_0004VSB|TrueTYP|2FND|[:digit:]+[:alnum:]*TXT|NumbersISR|TrueSNS|TrueDUA|FalseLB1|MD1|1RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_W_0005VSB|TrueTYP|2FND|[:alnum:]*[^0-9a-zàèéìòóù…"!\?—–«»“”,;'‘’:°\.\-\+\?\(\)\n\s][:alnum:]*TXT|Special charactersISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|FalseLB1|MD1|1RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_W_0006VSB|TrueTYP|2FND|[:alnum:]*[àáèéìíòóùú][:alnum:]+TXT|Interior accentsISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|FalseLB1|MD1|1RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_W_0007VSB|TrueTYP|2FND|[:upper:][:upper:]+[:alnum:]*TXT|Capitalized wordsISR|TrueSNS|TrueDUA|FalseLB1|MD1|1RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx>
